summary: If you know the red, yellow and blue, you will know this one too. All she is missing is the ability to fly.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://reaver.5gbfree.com/images/description.jpg[/img]
Say hello to Supergirl. This is an outfit a long time in the making. I've been working to get it right since I first learned to mod Skyrim. As the cape and neckline have been fixed, the latest 2.0 version is the final version.

You also get real super powers if you use the optional ESP. Just put the outfit on and start fighting. You'll see what I mean. This gal gives new meaning to the words "knuckle sandwich".

[img]http://reaver.5gbfree.com/images/location.jpg[/img]
You can find the outfit in two places in Skyrim. The first location is a display case in Dragon's Reach, near the Jarl's Quarters. The other place is somewhere on the Icerunner, a ship that nearly foundered after some genius put out the lighthouse fire.

[img]http://reaver.5gbfree.com/images/installation.jpg[/img]
Unrar the archive and place in "Data" folder. If you have any conflicts or issues with any aspect of your game upon installing this mod, please uninstall using the same method, but backwards.

[img]http://reaver.5gbfree.com/images/credits.jpg[/img]
I'd like to thank Bethesda for the cape.

[IMG]http://reaver.5gbfree.com/images/permissions.jpg[/IMG]
You may not upload, alter or distribute any parts of this Skyrim mod without my expressed permission.
author: Reaverlord
